mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, address, create_at, update_at, pt.name AS `type`, COUNT(ptime.pitch_id) AS sum_time, COUNT(i.id) AS sum_img FROM pitch p INNER JOIN pitch_type pt ON pt.id = p.pitch_type_id LEFT JOIN pitch_time ptime ON p.id = ptime.pitch_id LEFT JOIN image i ON p.id = i.pitch_id GROUP BY p.id, p.name, address, create_at, update_at, pt.name
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.address, p.create_at AS createAt, p.update_at AS updateAt, pt.id AS pitchTypeId FROM pitch p LEFT JOIN pitch_type pt ON pt.id = p.pitch_type_id
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.address, p.create_at AS createAt, p.update_at AS updateAt, pt.name AS pitchTypeName FROM pitch p LEFT JOIN pitch_type pt ON pt.id = p.pitch_type_id WHERE p.id = #{id}
